pages.title: Density Plate
pages.text: <item>Density Plates/$ allow manipulating gravity. They have two variants: <item>Density Plates/$ and <item>Anti-Density Plates/$.$(br2)They can face in any direction, and will pull (for <item>density plates/$) or push (for <item>anti-density plates/$) entities in front with a (default) range of 64 blocks. Entities are pushed/pulled at an acceleration of 240 blocks/s² (gravity is 32 blocks/s²).$(br2)This effect stacks with multiple plates, and works through walls. One plate will easily overcome gravity if pulling up, and applies to all entity types.$(br2)
A <item>Block of Cavorite/$ will block the effect of <item>density plates/$ from passing beyond it, and can be moved by pistons.$(br2)
